pullRequest.title: Fix command delivery not getting released, improve tracing
pullRequest.bodyText:
This fixes #2155.
The first commit fixes the command delivery potentially not getting updated in the CoAP adapter.
The second commit improves the overall Command & Control related tracing in the CoAP adapter by adopting the corresponding changes done for the HTTP adapter (#2153).

commit.message:
[#2155] Fix command delivery not getting released.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

Improve Command & Control related tracing (CoAP).

The CoAP adapter now tracks the reception of a
command in a separate span.

Signed-off-by: Carsten Lohmann <carsten.lohmann@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: Is that change from tenantValidationTracker to tenantTracker intended?
